SUB_W08_WRLD_SIUG_START_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_WRLD_SIUG_START_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I appear to be within the earth's depths.
Ah, but the stillness here reminds me
of the world from which I hail.

SUB_W08_WRLD_SIUG_START_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_WRLD_SIUG_START_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I can hardly wait to see what manner
of fascinating darkness I find here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Mmm. What is this at my feet?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Ah. Merely a worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Stay away from that worm, you!
It's mine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
None give orders to the Dismal King,
leastwise some meager furball.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Watch who you call a furball, buddy!
So who are you, anyway?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I would ask the same question of you.
Yet as you arrived from beneath the earth,
I assume you live in this dismal world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
You know what? It doesn't matter who
either of us are. Just give me the worm
already and we'll call it square.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
You are welcome to it; I have no need
for such a primitive creature.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You sure? I mean, really sure? Worm this big is a pretty rare find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Do not make me repeat myself.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yesss! Now I can finally go home!
You're good people, stranger. Take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Halt. There are towns in this world?
Mmm. Perhaps I will find something
that captures my interest there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
By town, I take it you mean our colonies?
Yeah, we have those. Anyway, see ya!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I told you to halt!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: What is it this time?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Take me to your colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Take yourself there, buddy! Unless...
Wait, can you not dig holes?
How have you LIVED, man!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
No respectable monarch would demean
themselves by frolicking in the dirt!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yeesh, I can't follow a word you say.
Fine, I'll take you to my house—
but then you're on your own. Capisce?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Capisce indeed. My name is Siugnas,
but you will call me the Dismal King.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I'm Tope, of the Kuld.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Butter me up all you want, buddy,
but I'm still not giving you any worms! Also, this kind of digging is perfectly
normal around here—you just need to
know where to find the soft soil.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Must you dig to travel
anywhere in this world?

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
You bet! The holes we dig fill up
on their own afterward, so no one
else ever gets to use 'em.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
That's 'cause you gotta look
at the big picture! See, when the earth gets dug up and filled in,
it makes the soil more fertile. That fertile
soil goes on to nurture nutrient-rich worms,
which all of us then chow down on.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm. Well, if such is the price to pay
for ensuring the sway of darkness over
this land, then so be it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I dunno about that.
All I know is that we couldn't get
by if we didn't do it this way.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Crummy thing is that worms have been real
hard to come by lately—but that's a tale
for another time. Now let's go home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Here's the colony where
we Kuld live.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is a mere burrow. How many of your
companions can possibly live here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Companions? Nah, we Kuld are solo types.
We only live with others because that makes
it easier to stay safe. So long story short, I don't know exactly
how many other Kuld live here, but it's a lot.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, let's go to my house.
It's over there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Coste! I'm home!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Late again, Tope! Ground below, how long
does it take to catch one measly worm!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! I'm hungry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: I know, honey. I know.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
See that? Your poor son is starving!
Now hand over the worms already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Here you go, honeybunch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you KIDDING me!? This is it?
Well, that's just pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Sorry, sweetie, but you know how poor
the hunting's been lately, and—

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear your excuses!
How pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I thought you just said your
people believe in acting alone?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: We do! Family's the exception.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, a guest! Well, this is unusual.
Why didn't you tell me you were bringing
someone home, you grubhead!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is Siugnas, honeybunch.
He gave me the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Siugnas, this is my wife, Coste,
and my son, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Noted.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry you had to see such a disgraceful
display, stranger. We don't have much,
but please make yourself at home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: And as for you, Tope...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Yes, sweetlips?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You're an idiot if you think this single
worm is enough for us! Little Gourmand
here is a growing pup, you know!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! When's fooooood!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Of course, honey. I'll be right back.
Just hold on, all right, Son?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You mentioned that worms
have been hard to come by?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, it's like their population dried
up all of a sudden. And it's not just
worms—other creatures too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Do you know the cause?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope, but I'm looking into it—because if
this continues, we're all gonna starve.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Your wife seemed to know little of your
predicament. Why do you not tell her?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
The last thing I want to do is cause
Coste any unnecessary worry.
Nope, this is something where I just
have to carry my own water.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I gotta get back to looking into
what's going on here, like I said.
What's your plan, friend?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
If you would return to the darkness, I would
accompany you; I will examine the settlement
of the furballs at a later time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, today I'm goin' farther than usual,
so we might end up runnin' into other species.
Sure you're ready for that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
If anything, I relish the thought
of meeting them. How many other
species are there besides yours?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Several—though we don't usually interact,
so I can't tell you much more. This world's got a kind of code, see:
stick to your own, avoid unnecessary spats,
and you'll generally be golden.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
One of the Bashar might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text: I suspect we have found one already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey! Get outta here, you!
This is Kuld territory!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
They seem to be in quite
the predicament...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Stop yelling, you silly mole!
What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, Coste! What a relief!
Where were you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
We both got bored waiting for you
to come home, so we took a little
walk to kill some time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry, honeypants, but it's not safe out
here right now. In fact, you should just stay
away from the colony altogether for a bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Don't need to tell me twice—just make
sure you come home with some good
worms this time. You hear me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes, thanks to you. Also, you're one
of the Kuld that live here, right?
Tope, I think?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
That's me, all right. But tell me,
have you seen a mole named Coste?
She's my wife.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Sure did! Said she was worried
and headed out to try and find you.
A real firecracker, that one!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, at least she's not here.
That's a relief.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Do you know anything about
the Bashar that attacked you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Nope. All I know is they came
after me outta nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: One of the Naml might be at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
Do you know anything about
the Naml that attacked you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text:
One of the Dufda might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You're not making this easy!
Whatever. Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
Do you know anything about
the Dufda that attacked you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
This is the final colony.
Will the Lord of the Earth
finally reveal itself here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: This is my house, and I will protect it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
The ground is shaking...
It's coming!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: It's not moving... Is it over?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Well, that won't be moving ever again.
Yet though the crisis is passed,
the darkness of pollution remains.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
This is probably the best way it could've
ended, actually. I hate the thought of relying
on something called the 'Lord of the Earth.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
By the by, you came here to look for
something, yeah? Didja find it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
What I sought was all around me from
the very beginning: the darkness which
engulfs this world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oookay? Well, glad it all worked out.
As for us, I feel confident we'll take back
our wormy world without the help of a 'lord.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Strive well and true, for the question
of whether or not this world falls even
more into darkness will be decided by
you and your kind alone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Tope! Where in the WORLD
have you been!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Gourmand? I'm gonna do it.
I'M GONNA DOOOOO IT!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh for the love of dirt... Maybe stop all
this fool yelling and go get us some worms,
you good-for-nothing mole!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ERRORS REPAIRED. RESTARTING.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
It still has some fight left,
I see. Most impressive.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. SOIL CONTAMINATION DETECTED. INITIATING CLEANUP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Huh? It left.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
No! It intends to purify the soil!
If it does so, the hold of darkness
on this world will be shattered!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Which means our world is saved!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Mmm. Well, I wager this isn't a complete disaster.
Darkness will never vanish completely from the
world, after all, so I must merely wait for the day
when it rises from its slumber to consume all.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Whatcha mumbling about there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
It matters not. You have my thanks, furball,
for you have given me something to which
I am greatly looking forward.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Glad to hear it. And while I can't wait to see
what the future holds for us, I'm guessing it's
gonna be chock-full of tasty, tasty worms.
Thanks for all the help, friend! Take care!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Coste! Gourmand! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm bored of worms, Mommy!
I wanna eat something TASTY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
...And that's why I need you
to take my son with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
You would leave your beloved child
in the care of the Dismal King?
What a strange father you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
All children need to leave the burrow
sometime, and I know you'll take very
good care of our little Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yaaay! I can't wait to eat
all of the tasties!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Your culinary standards will be far above
worms by the time you return from your
journey with me, child.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Just don't go teaching him
things a boy shouldn't know. And don't you go causing this
nice man any trouble, Gourmand!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Have fun, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Yaaaaaay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
So was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I mean, it could have just been one of the
carnivorous mushrooms the Naml use, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
What an amusing possibility. It seems
this world is still filled with unknown
forms of darkness after all.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: There's nothing amusing about any of this! And even if it is cleaning the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about being eating by some giant mushroom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
While I cannot answer your questions,
I appreciate the entertainment you provided,
and consider myself fortunate to have seen
this world's hidden darkness reveal itself.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Maybe the Naml were just waiting for a mighty
stranger like you to show up—but considering
you couldn't even dig through the earth without
my help, I think some gratitude is in order?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
True—although you also fulfilled
your role with aplomb.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
And on that note, I take my leave.
Farewell, furball.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
This has to be some bad Dufda
joke that went a little too far.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
You must be dissapointed we weren't able
to clean up this world's pollution.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning up the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about that thing swallowing me whole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
You have proved a fine source of entertainment
to me. I just wish I knew for true whether or not
that was the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Yeah, I suppose it might've actually
been the Lord of the Earth... You know what? I'm gonna say it was.
Heck, it renewed our soil, after all!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
I have much enjoyed my journey in this world—
and even with the soil purified, it is clear light
will never gain a foothold in this land.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the origin of that
big quake earlier.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: So this is the Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.text: UNABLE TO BOOT NORMALLY. SWITCHING TO START/STOP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
A machine that can purify soil?
What a trite way for this to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.text: ERROR. ERROR. ERROR. UNABLE TO EXECUTE START/STOP PROCESS. NORMAL OPERATIONS NOT GUARANTEED.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.text: TERRAFORMING PROCESS DEEMED A FAILURE. BEGINNING RESET OF WORLD ENVIRONMENT. ALERT. ALERT. THIS PROCESS IS DANGEROUS. OPERATORS MUST TAKE SHELTER IMMEDIATELY.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Bwa ha ha ha! Excellent! EXCELLENT!
I see my disappointment was premature!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.text:
It seeks to purify the world by destroying it.
All life within shall be born anew.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.text:
If it seeks to reconstruct the world,
it must begin by slaughtering all who
currently reside within.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_060.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_060.text:
Gyaaa! That means the
colonies are in danger!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.text: This is the Lord of Earth? It's merely a bug!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
There's something off about these bugs.
Their eyes are...dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
What does it matter if there is light in their eyes
so long as they can purify the soil as you wish?
Now go forth and do your works, bugs!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I've got an awful feeling about this.
We should look around the colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.text:
We will know whether the experiment
was a success or failure in short order.
Until then, I will search for beings that
capture my interest.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Oh, right. I forgot that's the
whole reason you came here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.text:
Hear me, earthen being from the dark!
Seek you destruction or rebirth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.text:
I don't think it's happy
about being woken up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! Glorious!
Destruction it is, then!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.text:
You will be hard-pressed to stop a creature
so driven by insatiable hunger.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_020.text:
What's THAT supposed to mean?
And what's it gonna eat?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.text:
More than worms, I promise you that.
I wager it plans to devour everything
in the colonies.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I know not, though
I certainly hope so.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text: There can be no stopping it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text: No. It makes for another colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Still, at least we were able to
repel it and save this one.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I wonder which colony will next
fall under its grim sway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text: Run wild! Show me your might!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
I wonder which colony will next
fall under its grim sway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text:
It appears we chose the
wrong destination.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text:
I wonder which colony will next
fall under its grim sway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Do you think whoever you're
looking for is here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
The ground's shaking! Is the person
you're looking for doing this?

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.text:
There was a worm in
that mound of earth.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sometimes you find goodies when you dig
holes. At first you might think that something's
gotten in your way, but worms often hide out
in places like that, so I personally welcome it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Noted. I will be sure to investigate
anything that emerges from the dirt.

SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_SIUG_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Considering we found one already,
I'm guessing you may just be my
lucky charm, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
What manner of people
are the Bashar?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Primitive and violent to the very last.
Nothing good ever comes of dealing with
them, but let's hope this ends up being
the exception that proves the rule. Anyway, there's gotta be a clue here,
so let's get to looking.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
The worms are gone.
The Creator is angry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
We do not have enough offerings.
I will find an offering for the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: There are divinities in this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
No idea—but if I had to guess, I'd say
they thought one up for themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
And posed no more threat than
a mewling kitten. Pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They are strong. So strong.
We cannot give them as offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I will search for an offering.
I will search elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They mentioned something about
searching for offerings, no?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Offerings... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: You return. What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about this, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth is dirty now.
The earth is bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth's life is the world's life.
It is hopeless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So there's nothing we can do!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Choosing to surrender yourself to
destruction is the correct decision—
albeit also the most dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We pray to the Creator.
We pray every day.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Is there genuinely no way to avert
destruction? Look deep into my eyes
and claim as much.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There is one way.
But it will anger the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: The Dismal King fears no messiah.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. The Creator hates the weak.
We must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
I trust you are satisfied with
the might of the Dismal King?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You are strong. The Creator likes you.
We can tell you now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Then do so with haste.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Wake up the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth?
Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth eats foul dirt.
The Lord of the Earth makes clean dirt.
The Lord of the Earth serves the Creator.
The Lord of the Earth made the world with the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth is asleep.
It has been sleeping long and long.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So if we awaken this 'Lord of the Earth,'
it will purify the soil for us?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Yes. But it is dangerous.
The Lord of the Earth is violent.
The Lord of the Earth listens only to the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
It is bad to wake it up
of your own will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You greatly underestimate the Dismal King
if you think I have reason to fear!
Is this not true, furball?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Siugnas and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So where will we find this Lord of
the Earth? I trust we aren't meant
to literally pummel it awake?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Remove the keystones. There are two.
This will wake the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: And where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There and there. One in each place.
They are big stones. With pictures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Then let us leave
in search of them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: What manner of people are the Naml?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They are extremely prolific—by which
I mean there's a heck of a lot of 'em. They're not hostile, exactly, but they sure
ain't friendly either. I wouldn't be here if
I didn't have to be, so let's start looking
for clues.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: Then let us be on the move.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
The colony's food reserves are low.
We must go harvesting.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
We are going to procure
some of them right now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I found the perfect seedbeds
right here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They'll need a better effort if they
hope to compete with the Dismal King!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: We cannot use them as seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They mentioned something about
searching for seedbeds, no?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: What manner of race are the Dufda?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Honestly, I don't know 'em very well—
rarely even seen 'em, in fact. All I
know is I wanna find a clue and get
out of here as quick as we can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: Then let us be on the move.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Why don't we go to the toys?
We could play with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Oooh, that could be fun.
But we need feed for the toys.
Let's go find some.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Do you think they will
capture worms?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
These pathetic creatures would be
better served as feed themselves!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They are not good for feed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Boo! Killjoys! Boo!
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
They mentioned something about
searching for feed, no?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Feed... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
The Bashar are gathering all
of their captured victims.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
We've brought our offerings, O Creator!
Feast well! Feast well!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: We were unable to gather offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: Then you will be our offering.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! The people they captured
have turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
You saw our ceremony. This is bad.
We must kill everyone who saw.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! That Bashar
turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
The Creator created this world.
The Creator gives us worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
But the Creator has been angry lately.
So we must give offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Offerings? Those are just a bunch of
carnivorous mushrooms, you dirtbags!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: Do not go against the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: So what will you do? Giving up would make life much easier for you, mmm?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
I'll NEVER give up! But much as I hate to
say it, we won't find the answers we need
among the Kuld; we have to venture out
and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
The Naml are gathering
all of their victims.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
You will become seedbeds.
Seedbeds for our food.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Sadly, we met with an obstacle and
were unable to secure our seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
This responsibility lies with you.
You will be our seedbed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! The people they captured
have turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
You have learned the secret to our
food supply. This cannot stand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! That Naml
turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Securing our food. These mushrooms
create an infinite supply of seedbeds
from other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms will allow us
to live forever.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: You're sacrificing people!? What a sick joke!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: So what will you do? Giving up would make life much easier for you, mmm?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
I'll NEVER give up! But much as I hate to
say it, we won't find the answers we need
among the Kuld; we have to venture out
and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
The Dufda are gathering
all of their victims.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Hooray for all of you!
You get to be feed for our toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Sorryyy! Stuff came up and
I couldn't bring anyone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! The people they captured
have turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
You saw our toys, didn't you?
We cannot allow this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Bwa ha ha! That Dufda
turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms are our toys.
Aren't they cool?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
They turn regular people into mushroom
people. Isn't that awesome?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Stop playing with lives,
you pimply tadpoles!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
That's manure and you know it!
This world is eat or be eaten!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text: So what will you do? Giving up would make life much easier for you, mmm?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
I'll NEVER give up! But much as I hate to
say it, we won't find the answers we need
among the Kuld; we have to venture out
and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Will we find the Bashar here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Bashar! What do you want, you scoundrel?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: An offering! An offering!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They are in quite the predicament.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They can handle themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: So be it. Farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Foiled again. They are strong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did not ask for your help.
You did this without permission.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did indeed. Now then, I take it you
know not why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Will we find the Dufda here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
What does a Dufda want from this place?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Found feed! Found feed!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They are in quite the predicament.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They can handle themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: So be it. Farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Uuugh. Fiiine.
Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I didn't ask for your help!
You just went ahead and gave it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I did indeed. Now then, I take it you
know not why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I told you, I have nothing to say.
Now begone from this place.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is no cause. The clean earth has
merely become sullied over the passing
of many, many years.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That is what earth is. The coming end
of the earth's life span means the world's
end is upon us as well. This is our fate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Choosing to surrender yourself to
destruction is the correct decision—
albeit also the most dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We Naml have prepared for this situation by
building up our food stores for a long time.
Even if there are no more worms to capture,
we will endure.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Is there genuinely no way to avert
destruction? Look deep into my eyes
and claim as much.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is a way, but it comes at great risk.
So instead of engaging with that risk,
we have chosen a more definitive way
of extending our life spans.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So you don't care if everyone else dies
as long as the Naml are all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Yet we are not the only ones doing so.
No, your words are not something
I care to hear from a selfish Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Enough. Tell us the means by which
we might extend this world's life.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Hold on, Siugnas!
I never agreed to this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: I care not. I will do it. You may run on back to your hole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Grrr! Fine, then! I'll do it!
I'll do it for my family!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
This is not something we can leave
to the weak. So before I tell you,
I must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I trust you are satisfied with
the might of the Dismal King?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well done. I suppose it is safe
to leave this in your hands.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Then speak.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You must wake the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
In the beginning, this world was naught but
sullied soil. But the Lord of the Earth
purified the land, creating the chance for
life to blossom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Once it was finished, it is said the
Lord of the Earth slipped into a
long slumber in a place unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So if we awaken this 'Lord of the Earth,'
it will purify the soil for us?
Mmm. It is but a trifling task.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Even if you manage to rouse the Lord of the Earth,
it does not mean it will purify the earth as we
hope. Indeed, it may go beyond purification and
end up destroying the entire world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Do you understand the risk that comes with
waking a being that has the power to remake
the world completely?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
The rebirth or destruction of an entire
world? This is getting interesting,
is it not, furball?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Siugnas and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So where will we find this Lord of
the Earth? I trust we aren't meant
to literally pummel it awake?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I know not where it is, but legends claim the
Lord of the Earth is held in slumber by two
keystones of opposing powers. If you move
them, it might cause the Lord to awaken.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Each stone rests not far from this colony.
Look for enormous rocks carved with reliefs
of creatures unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Then let us be on the move.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Will we find the Bashar here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Ew! Get out of here, Bashar!
You're gross!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
They seem to be in quite
the predicament...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Bashar's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Do you know why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Will we find the Naml here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
They seem to be in quite
the predicament...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Naml's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Do you know why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Nothing's causing it!
The soil is just dirty now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
It's the end of the earth's life,
which means it's the end of the world's
life—and you can't do much about that!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Choosing to surrender yourself to
destruction is the correct decision—
albeit also the most dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We Dufda take the days as they come.
Now we'll just have fun until the end!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Is there genuinely no way to avert
destruction? Look deep into my eyes
and claim as much.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Heh! You're funny, pal! And yeah, there's a way.
I just don't care about it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Fiiine, I'll tell you...
AFTER you play with me!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
I trust you are satisfied with
the might of the Dismal King?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Wee hee hee! What fun!
So fine, I'll tell you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You have to wake up the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Some weirdo who eats the dirty earth and
makes it all clean. I heard he cleaned the
whole world once back when it was all filthy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So if we awaken this 'Lord of the Earth,'
it will purify the soil for us?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, except I don't think he's
really gonna listen to you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
In fact, he'll probably get all mad
that you woke him and go hog wild!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You greatly underestimate the Dismal King
if you think I have reason to fear!
Is this not true, furball?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Siugnas and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So where will we find this Lord of
the Earth? I trust we aren't meant
to literally pummel it awake?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Dunno! Oh, but I hear it's snoozing 'cause
of two keystones with opposing powers?
So you probably wanna try moving those.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
There's one in one place, and another in...
Ummmm... Some other place. They're big rocks
with carvings of weird creatures on 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: Then let us be on the move.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Will we find the Naml here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
They seem to be in quite
the predicament...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They can handle themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: So be it. Farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Do you know why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Will we find the Dufda here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I'm gonna make you feed
for my toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
They seem to be in quite
the predicament...

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They can handle themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: I suppose I must save them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: So be it. Farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ugh, stop bothering me!
Fiiine, I'll go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: I see they are still unharmed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Do you know why worms have been
disappearing from this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Siugnas.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Mmm. This must be a keystone.
We shall move it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, look at the keystone!
The relief is moving!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, that was a surprise.
What WAS that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
A powerful being demands a suitably
powerful seal, I suppose.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
So we have to do it again?
Ugh. Talk about annoying.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I bet those reliefs are
gonna attack us again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I will keep you safe.
Now push, furball!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text:
We have now moved both keystones.
This should be enough to rouse the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text: Came from over there. Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your stones. So many stones.
Will you give them to me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
You desire these?
But they are mere stones.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps they are mere stones to you,
but they are necessities to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, what fine stones! Please accept
this small token of my thanks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
What do you intend
to use them for?

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: You will find out soon enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text: So many... Perhaps this is enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
He's made a veritable
mountain out of them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
I have been exposed to the elements
this whole time, but now I can
finally rest in peace.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have been a great help to me.
But now, farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Rest in the tranquility
of eternal darkness.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.text:
You are our god now.
We offer ourselves to you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.text:
We would be delighted to become
seedbeds for you, O Dismal King!

SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W08_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
You are an enthralling individual.
Know then that even from afar,
your soul will be with me always.
